sen.j: 平 政連（たいら の まさつら、生没年不詳）は、鎌倉時代末期の幕府官僚。
sen.e: TAIRA no Masatsura (dates of birth and death unknown) was a bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) bureaucrat in the late Kamakura period.

sen.e: One theory says that he is the author of "TAIRA no Masatsura isamegusa" (Remonstration by TAIRA no Masatsura) written in 1308 and addressed to Uchi-Kanrei (head of the Tokuso Family) Munetsuka NAGASAKI of the Tokuso Family of the Hojo clan, but this is not confirmed.
